title: Honor Level 2 Stuck?
body:
I never received a penalty on this account ever and every game I get 1-3 honors, I play 6-8 games every day and still didn't get to level 3, while on my level 14 smurf I counted every honor I got, they were 20 and got level 3 honor :/
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Same here, have a friend who barely plays. He is honor level 5. I play every day at least receiving 2 honors a day since the release and still Level 2. And you say there is no bugs? lulz
No current bugs with Honor right now like getting stuck, but it does take a while.  Keep it up, and you'll get it with time!
I am also stuck at lv 2,I even managed to get into a game with a lv 4 draven telling everyone to kill themselves because he did not care about the game at all

Same ... My friends who play a lot less than me already got to lvl 4 and 5 and I'm stuck at lvl 2 for some reason.

I don't know why but it's kinda frustrating to hear the phrase "just play more and you'll get it".

I play alot. Probably too much. And my friends who plays 5 times less games than me is already lvl 4

First I thought it would be a fun system but it just frustrates and demotivates me now because I don't get as many Keyfragments anymore since I just won't level up.
